alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Garfield...south central San Juan and northeastern Kane Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Halls Crossing, or 46 miles west of Mexican Hat, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Halls Crossing, Bullfrog, Glen Canyon National Recreation Area and Ticaboo. This includes Utah Route 276 between mile markers 28 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands
